p: Prototype LEDs steered to the desired colour point and colour temperature were built using a standard 3030 mid-power LED package (3 × 3 mm external dimension, λ dom blue LED equals 449 nm, dimension 0.89 mm × 0.56 mm ca. 0.5 mm 2) with the phosphors suspended in a commercially available high refracting index silicone. Measurements were carried out with an in-house-built system based on an integrating sphere (ISP150) coupled to an Instrument Systems Compact Array Spectrometer (CAS-140B) at an operating current of 65 mA.
